meanings.definition: The state or quality of having a sense of self-importance or self-worth.
meanings.sent1: Her egoity was evident in the way she always talked about herself.
meanings.sent2: His egoity often made it challenging for others to connect with him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his egoity, he still managed to be a good friend to those who knew him well.
meanings.sent4: The egoity of the peacock as it strutted around the garden was hard to miss.
meanings.sent5: The egoity of the lion as it surveyed its kingdom was truly majestic.

meanings.definition: The quality of being self-centered or self-absorbed.
meanings.sent1: She displayed egoity by always making the conversation about herself.
meanings.sent2: His egoity often led him to disregard the feelings of those around him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his egoity, he still managed to make people laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The egoity of the cat as it demanded attention was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent5: The egoity of the toddler as she proudly showed off her drawing was adorable.
